statements: SELECT * FROM legal_case_law;
SELECT case_name, court_name FROM legal_case_law;
SELECT * FROM legal_case_law WHERE court_name = 'Supreme Court';
SELECT case_name, case_date FROM legal_case_law ORDER BY case_date DESC;
SELECT case_id, legal_arguments FROM legal_case_law WHERE case_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM legal_case_law ORDER BY case_date DESC;
SELECT case_name, court_name, case_date FROM legal_case_law WHERE court_name = 'Supreme Court';
SELECT case_id, case_name, court_name FROM legal_case_law WHERE case_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM legal_case_law WHERE legal_arguments ->> 'plaintiff' = 'John Doe';
SELECT COUNT(*), court_name FROM legal_case_law GROUP BY court_name ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;
SELECT * FROM cases WHERE case_language = 'English';
SELECT case_name, case_date FROM cases WHERE case_language = 'French';
SELECT case_body FROM cases WHERE case_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM legal_arguments WHERE argument_id = 'a1234567-8901-2345-6789-012345678901';
SELECT argument_text, related_cases FROM legal_arguments WHERE argument_text LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY argument_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM cases;
SELECT case_name, case_date, case_language FROM cases WHERE case_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT case_name, case_body FROM cases WHERE case_language = 'English' ORDER BY case_date DESC;
SELECT argument_text FROM legal_arguments WHERE argument_id IN (SELECT argument_id FROM legal_arguments WHERE related_cases @> '[{"case_id": "123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000"}]');
SELECT argument_text, related_cases->'case_id' FROM legal_arguments WHERE related_cases @> '[{"case_id": "123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000"}]';
SELECT * FROM case_law;
SELECT case_name, court_name, case_date FROM case_law;
SELECT case_name, court_name FROM case_law WHERE case_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT case_name, court_name, argument_text FROM case_law INNER JOIN case_law_support ON case_law.case_id = case_law_support.case_id INNER JOIN legal_arguments ON case_law_support.argument_id = legal_arguments.argument_id;

SELECT case_name AS CaseName, court_name AS CourtName, argument_text AS ArgumentText FROM case_law INNER JOIN case_law_support ON case_law.case_id = case_law_support.case_id INNER JOIN legal_arguments ON case_law_support.argument_id = legal_arguments.argument_id WHERE case_law_support.support_id = 1;
SELECT case_id, case_name, court_name, case_date FROM case_law;
SELECT court_name, case_id, case_name, case_date FROM case_law;
SELECT case_name, court_name, case_date FROM case_law WHERE case_id = 1;
SELECT case_name, court_name FROM case_law WHERE case_date <= '2023-01-01';
SELECT argument_id, argument_text FROM legal_arguments ORDER BY argument_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM cases;
SELECT case_name, court_name FROM cases WHERE court_location = 'New York';
SELECT case_name, court_name, filed_date FROM cases ORDER BY filed_date DESC;
SELECT argument_text FROM legal_arguments WHERE case_id = '12345';
SELECT law_title, law_date FROM case_law ORDER BY law_date ASC;
SELECT case_id, case_name, court_name FROM cases WHERE filed_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM legal_arguments WHERE LENGTH(argument_text) > 100;
SELECT law_title, law_date FROM case_law ORDER BY law_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT case_id, court_location FROM cases WHERE court_name = 'Supreme Court';
SELECT c.case_name, cl.law_title FROM cases c, case_law cl, case_law_relationship clr WHERE c.case_id = clr.case_id AND clr.law_id = cl.law_id;
SELECT case_name, argument FROM case_law;
SELECT lawyer_id, first_name, last_name FROM lawyer WHERE specialty='Criminal Defense';
SELECT court_name, location FROM court ORDER BY court_name DESC;
SELECT firm_name, location FROM law_firm WHERE location='New York';
SELECT case_id, lawyer_id, date, outcome FROM case_history WHERE outcome='Settled' ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT * FROM case_law LIMIT 5;
SELECT case_name, argument FROM case_law WHERE case_id = 10;
SELECT lawyer_id, first_name, specialty FROM lawyer ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM case_history WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT court_name, location FROM court WHERE court_id IN (1, 3, 5);
